Traits.Name: Overdrive 3
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage if the current round is 3 or higher.

Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Arrowsense
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Actions.Name: Aim
Actions.Description: Boost damage of next ranged attack, and double range.
